summary: Resume builder: implement live resume preview that updates as the user types across all sections, removing the need for a manual submit-to-preview action.

existing_features.title: Remove the manual “Submit to Preview” interaction from the Resume Editor page UI, including removing the button and updating any helper/instructional text that references submitting to see the preview.

Change the resume preview panel on the Resume Editor page to render the current in-progress resume data live as the user types across all sections (personal info, headline, links, summary, skills, experience, projects, education, certifications).
Update the Full Preview & Download page to display the same live, current resume data that the user is editing (so it matches the editor preview), and ensure PDF download uses that current data.

Remove or refactor any state/store logic that depends on a separate “submitted resume” snapshot for preview rendering (including the submit-and-reset behavior), so that preview rendering is driven by the draft/in-progress resume data.

new_feature_requests.summary: Enable live resume preview that updates as the user types across all sections and remove the 'submit to preview' button entirely.
